title: Bug in Yorick's Voicelines.
body: My friend and I have noticed a strange interaction between Kled and Yorick that is most definitely a bug. When killing Kled, Yorick says **"One more nail in the coffin of the isles."** This voice-line is supposed to be reserved for Shadow Isles Champions ONLY. I'm 100% sure Kled is NOT from the Shadow Isles. This bug is tiny and it doesn't matter that much overall, but its a major annoyance for Yorick players. A fix would be lovely Riot.

replies.body:
hmmm...this definitely sounds like it might be a bug.  To be honest though, on the grand scale of things, this is going to rank pretty low.  So it might not get fixed any time soon >.<  

Still, I really appreciate you taking the time to create a Boards post about it!  Definitely worth bringing it to our attention!
No problem! I appreciate how quickly you replied!

Wow I can't imagine kled saying that...
{{champion:240}}
